oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Red Foley and the Dawnbusters - WLS Quick Elastic program - 1945-05-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WLS program featuring Red Foley, Eva Overstake, and the Dawnbusters, sponsored by Quick Elastic starch. Originally broadcast 1945-05-12. The announcer may be Jack Stilwell, Jack Brinkley, or Jack Holden (unconfirmed). The Dawnbusters may include David Boehme, Frank Messina, and Jim Palacek (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Eva Overstake; Dawnbusters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Weather report -- Theme (Sweethearts Forever) -- Opening statement (Jack [?]) -- Tell Him I'm Blue (Eva Overstake) -- Jack [?] introduces Eva Overstake and Red Foley -- Poor Little Me (Eva Overstake, Red Foley) -- Quick Elastic commercial (Jack [?], Eva Overstake, Red Foley) -- Jack [?] introduces Red Foley -- I'm In Love With The Mother Of My Best Girl (Red Foley) -- Jack [?] introduces the Dawnbusters -- Song Of The West (Dawnbusters) -- Jack [?] introduces Red Foley -- Just A Prayer Away (Red Foley) -- Quick Elastic commercial (Jack [?]) -- Theme (Sweethearts Forever) -- Closing statement (Jack [?])
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WLS (Radio station : Chicago, Ill.); Red Foley show (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Martin, Judy, 1918-1951; Dawnbusters (Musical group)
